members.name: Storage.length
members.description: Returns an integer representing the number of data items stored in the Storage object.

members.name: Storage.key()
members.description: When passed a number n, this method will return the name of the nth key in the storage.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: An integer representing the number of the key you want to get the name of. This is a zero-based index.

members.name: Storage.getItem()
members.description: When passed a key name, will return that key's value.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the name of the key you want to retrieve the value of.

members.name: Storage.setItem()
members.description: When passed a key name and value, will add that key to the storage, or update that key's value if it already exists.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the name of the key you want to create/update.

parameters.name: keyValue
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the value you want to give the key you are creating/updating.

members.name: Storage.removeItem()
members.description: When passed a key name, will remove that key from the storage.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: A DOMString containing the name of the key you want to remove.

members.name: Storage.clear()
members.description: When invoked, will empty all keys out of the storage.
